org.switchyard

Interface ServiceDomain


  • public interface ServiceDomain
    A ServiceDomain represents a collection of services with a shared set of resources, configuration, and policy definitions. The ServiceDomain interface is used by software components to provide and/or consume services. These software components include protocol gateways, service containers, translation engines, adapters, orchestration and routing engines.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
        Initialize the service domain. This method exists to allow additional properties and resources to be associated with the service domain before it is started.

      • getName

        QName getName()
        Name of the ServiceDomain. This is unique within a runtime.
        Returns:
        name name of the ServiceDomain.

      • registerService

        Service registerService(QName serviceName,
                      ServiceInterface contract,
                      ExchangeHandler handler)
        Register a service with the domain.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service
        handler - the handler to use to process exchanges directed at this service
        contract - service interface details
        Returns:
        the registered service

      • registerService

        Service registerService(QName serviceName,
                      ServiceInterface contract,
                      ExchangeHandler handler,
                      ServiceMetadata metadata)
        Register a service with the domain.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service
        handler - the handler to use to process exchanges directed at this service
        contract - service interface details
        metadata - runtime metadata associated with the service
        Returns:
        the registered service

      • registerServiceReference

        ServiceReference registerServiceReference(QName serviceName,
                                        ServiceInterface metadata)
        Register a service reference with the domain.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the reference
        metadata - service consumer contract
        Returns:
        a reference to the registered service that can be used to unregister when required

      • registerServiceReference

        ServiceReference registerServiceReference(QName serviceName,
                                        ServiceInterface contract,
                                        ExchangeHandler handler)
        Register a service reference with the domain.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the reference
        contract - service consumer contract
        handler - the handler to use to process replies from the service
        Returns:
        a reference to the registered service that can be used to unregister when required

                                        ServiceInterface contract,

        ServiceReference getServiceReference(QName serviceName)
        Fetches a registered service reference for the specified name.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - name of the service reference
        Returns:
        registered service reference, or null if no references have been registered with the specified name.

        ValidatorRegistry getValidatorRegistry()
        Returns a reference to the validator registry for this domain.
        Returns:
        validator registry instance

      • addEventObserver

        ServiceDomain addEventObserver(EventObserver observer,
                             Class<? extends EventObject> eventType)
        Add an EventObserver for the specified event type. A single instance of EventObserver can be registered to receive multiple event types.
        Parameters:
        observer - the event observer to add
        eventType - the event type to receive notifications on
        Returns:
        a reference to this ServiceDomain for chaining multiple addEventObserver() calls

      • removeObserver

        void removeObserver(EventObserver observer)
        Remove all event registrations for a given EventObserver instance.
        Parameters:
        observer - the observer to unregister

      • removeObserverForEvent

        void removeObserverForEvent(EventObserver observer,
                          Class<? extends EventObject> event)
        Remove an EventObserver from a specific event type.
        Parameters:
        observer - the EventObserver to unregister
        event - the event to unregister

      • getEventPublisher

        EventPublisher getEventPublisher()
        Returns the EventPublisher for this domain, which can be used to notify event observers of activity.
        Returns:
        event publisher

      • getServiceSecurity

        ServiceSecurity getServiceSecurity(String name)
        Gets a ServiceSecurity by name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name
        Returns:
        the ServiceSecurity

      • setProperty

        ServiceDomain setProperty(String name,
                        Object value)
        Sets the specified property on this domain.
        Parameters:
        name - property name
        value - property value
        Returns:
        this ServiceDomain instance

      • getProperty

        Object getProperty(String name)
        Returns the value of the specified domain property.
        Parameters:
        name - property name
        Returns:
        the value associated with this property, or null if no such property exists.

      • getProperties

        Map<String,Object> getProperties()
        Shared properties/POJOs for this service domain. The returned map does not permit updates to domain properties. The setProperty() method should be used for setting/updating properties
        Returns:
        unmodifiable map of all domain properties

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Cleans up all resources associated with a ServiceDomain instance including the transformer/validator/service registry and exchange bus. ServiceDomain instances can not be used after they are destroyed.
